text:
Yor Ying Thai Cuisine has officially earned its spot in my Top 3 Best Thai Restaurants in Singapore! Having visited five times already, I can confidently say this hidden gem serves some of the most authentic and flavorful Thai food around.

One of the standout experiences this time was discovering a special off-the-menu dish—a creamy shellfish creation cooked with coconut milk and a medley of rich Thai herbs. The dish exuded the essence of Thai countryside flavors, boasting the perfect balance of creaminess, spice, and herbal aroma. It felt like a heartfelt homage to authentic Thai cuisine.

This isn’t just food; it’s an experience. Yor Ying Thai Cuisine consistently delivers the bold, rich flavors that remind me why Thai food is so universally loved. I’m already planning my next visit. Highly recommended, reasonable price with no GST and service charges too.

This restaurant is tucked away in a condominium located in a quiet neighborhood. Parking is available along the roadside at the end of a no-through road. While the prices seemed higher, they don’t charge GST or service fees. We ordered Phad Thai and Pineapple Rice, both of which were enjoyable. The serene and pleasant environment makes it an ideal spot for a quiet lunch.

Enjoyed freshness of ingredients & good portions. Drinks & Desserts are huge so best to share. Interior has nice decor. Outdoors pet friendly. Good place, friendly folks, for couple or family dining good choice. Prices on menu are nett.

While my family and I having our meal, the chef personally came to our table and kindly asked for our feedback on the food, inquiring if it was too spicy and to our liking. The flavors were bold and authentic with the vibrant Thai herbs. When want to pay the bill, we expecting GST and service charges to be added, but there were none! This made our dinner experience even more delightful.
Food was very tasty and fresh. Would definitely go back and try other noodle and rice dishes. Service can be a little slow but worth the wait!
